description:
The Hike Cool-Lite 3/4 Crew socks are ultralight, extremely breathable, and odour-resistant socks for any trip out on the trails. The durable, quick-drying design features icebreaker's Cool-Lite™ fabric, with key support zones in the Achilles and instep. Reinforcements in the heel and toe increases durability, while the seamless toe reduces bulk and prevents blisters. Soft merino and TENCEL™ Lyocell, sourced from responsible eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a fabric that helps to regulate your body’s microclimate.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Hike 3Q Crew Socks - Cool-Lite - Mens
